TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract RibbonGallery implements class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent, class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonControl, class System.ComponentModel.IComponent, class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 表示一个控件，该控件显示 对象和 控件的菜单。

span.span: Represents a control that displays a menu of objects and controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与接口一样, 会显示对象和 控件的菜单。 Like the interface, displays a menu of objects and controls. 与接口不同, 当用户单击时, 接口将引发事件, 而不是事件。 Unlike the Interface, the interface raises events, rather than events, when a user clicks a . 例如 , 这意味着, 当用户单击两次时, 将引发两次事件。This means, for example, that the event is raised twice when a user clicks the same twice. (当对同一方案进行初始选择时, 最多会引发一次此事件,具体取决于第一次单击之前所做的选择。)(The event would be raised at most once when the initial selection was made for the same scenario on a , depending on what the selection was before the first click.) 属性控制当前选定的是否从未选定的项中以可视方式区分。 The property controls whether the currently selected is visually differentiated from the unselected items. 一次只能选择一个项。Only one item at a time can be selected in a . 属性可用于指定16x16 和32x32 以外的图像大小。The property can be used to specify image sizes other than 16x16 and 32x32. ### 在设计时添加 RibbonDropDownItem 对象To add RibbonDropDownItem objects at design time 1. 在 "**属性**" 窗口中单击 " **Items** " 属性。Click the **Items** property in the **Properties** window. 2. 单击省略号 (**...**)。Click the ellipsis (**...**). 3. 在**下拉集合编辑器**中, 添加、排序和编辑新项。In the **DropDown Collection Editor**, add, order, and edit new items. 您可以在设计时将控件添加到。You can add controls to a at design time. ### 在设计时添加 RibbonButton 控件To add RibbonButton controls at design time 1. 单击 "**属性**" 窗口中的 "**按钮**" 属性。Click the **Buttons** property in the **Properties** window. 2. 单击省略号 (**...**)。Click the ellipsis (**...**). 3. 在**按钮集合编辑器**中, 添加、排序和编辑新的按钮控件。In the **Button Collection Editor**, add, order, and edit new button controls. 您可以通过使用 对象的方法在运行时创建。You can create a at run time by using the method of the object. 可通过两种方法来访问 对象：There are two ways to access the object: - 通过使用 Ribbon 类的 `Factory` 属性。By using the `Factory` property of the Ribbon class. 可从 Ribbon 类中的代码使用此方法。Use this approach from code in your Ribbon class. - 通过使用 `Globals.Factory.GetRibbonFactory` 方法。By using the `Globals.Factory.GetRibbonFactory` method. 可从 Ribbon 类外的代码使用此方法。Use this approach from code outside your Ribbon class. 只能在功能区加载到 Office 应用程序之前或在运行时将控件添加到动态菜单之前设置此控件的某些属性。Some properties of this control can be set only before the Ribbon is loaded into the Office application or before the control is added to a dynamic menu at run time. 有关设置这些属性的信息, 请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For information about setting these properties, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview). [!INCLUDE[vsto_interface](~/includes/vsto-interface-md.md)] ## 用法Usage [!INCLUDE[vsto_net35mref](~/includes/vsto-net35mref-md.md)]

summary.span: 用户单击此 上的按钮时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a user clicks a button on this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果单击上的任何按钮, 将引发此事件。This event is raised if any button is clicked on the . 您可以通过检查事件处理程序的`sender`参数来确定单击了哪个按钮。You can determine which button was clicked by examining the `sender` parameter of the event handler.

summary.span: 获取此 上的按钮的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of buttons on this .

value.span: 此 上的按钮集合。

span.span: The collection of buttons on this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在运行时向此添加按钮。You can add buttons to this at run time. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .

summary.span: 用户单击此 上的项时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a user clicks an item on this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次用户单击此 上的时, 都会引发此事件。This event is raised every time a user clicks a on this . `true`如果将属性设置为, 则仅当用户单击当前未选择的项时, 才会引发此事件。If the property is set to `true`, this event is raised only when a user clicks an item that is not currently selected.

summary.span: 获取或设置此 中的“项”列的数量。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of Item columns in this .

value.span: 此中项列的数目。

span.span: The number of Item columns in this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅在某些情况下, 才能在运行时设置此属性。This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview).

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件的大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the size of the control.

value.span: 一个RibbonControlSize , 它表示控件的大小。

span.span: A Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize that represents the size of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是菜单的一部分, 则此属性不起作用。This property has no effect if the is part of a menu. 如果父`ItemSize`控件的设置为`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeRegular` ,则在菜单上显示的将始终设置为。`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge` The of a that appears on a menu is always set to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeRegular` unless the parent control's `ItemSize` is set to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`. 若要使下拉菜单控件显示得更大, 请将的属性设置为`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`。To make drop-down menu controls appear larger, set the property of the to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`. 此属性可在运行时设置。This property can be set at run time.

summary.span: 获取或设置菜单或拆分按钮中此 控件上显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that appears on this control on a menu or split button.

value.span: 一个 ，表示菜单或拆分按钮上的文本。

span.span: A that represents the text on a menu or split button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此控件嵌套在另一个菜单或拆分按钮中, 菜单的属性或拆分按钮的属性设置为`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`时, 将显示此说明。The description appears when this control is nested in another menu or split button, and the property of the menu, or the property of the split button, is set to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`. 可以在运行时更改此属性。This property can be changed at run time.

summary.span: 获取或设置在按钮上显示的图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the image that is displayed on the button.

value.span: 一个在按钮上显示的 。

span.span: An that is displayed on the button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建议的图像格式为 PNG, 因为 PNG 格式的图像通过其 alpha 通道支持透明度。The recommended image format is PNG, because images in the PNG format support transparency through their alpha channel. 属性标识控件显示的图像。The property identifies an image that is displayed by the control. 此属性可在设计时或运行时设置。This property can be set at design time or at run time. 如果在运行时更新此属性, 控件的外观将更新以反映更改。If you update this property at run time, the control's appearance is updated to reflect the change. 如果设置了 属性, 则将忽略和属性。 If the property is set, the and properties are ignored. 尽管属性比其他两个属性提供的控件更多, 但它可能会变慢, 因为每次更新控件时, 都会将 image 对象发送到 Office 应用程序。Although the property gives you more control than the other two properties do, it can be slower because the image object is sent to the Office application every time the control is updated. 属性`true`必须为, 控件才能显示图像。The property must be `true` for the control to display the image. 在设计时设置属性时, Visual Studio 会将属性自动设置为`true`。When you set the property at design time, Visual Studio automatically sets the property to `true`. 如果在运行时设置属性, 必须在代码中将属性设置为`true` 。If you set the property at run time, you must set the property to `true` in your code.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个名称，该名称可用于在 事件处理程序中标识 。

span.span: Gets or sets the name that you can use to identify the in the event handler.

value.span: 一个字符串，可用于在 事件处理程序中标识 。

span.span: A string that you can use in the event handler to identify the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅在某些情况下, 才能在运行时设置此属性。This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview). 属性标识控件显示的图像。The property identifies an image that is displayed by the control. Office 应用程序仅从解决方案中检索一次此映像, 以提高性能。The Office application retrieves this image from your solution only once, to improve performance. 只能在设计时设置此属性, 因为该属性标识的图像将在事件中加载。This property can be set only at design time, because the image it identifies is loaded during the event. 当显示功能区时, 每个映像名称只引发一次。 is raised only once per image name, when the Ribbon is displayed. 之后, 不能使用此属性更改控制图像。After that, the control image cannot be changed by using this property. 若要加载图像, 请将代码添加到事件处理程序。To load the image, add code to the event handler. 检查的属性,并将对象的属性设置为要加载的图像。 Check the property of the and set the property of the object to the image that you want to load. 如果设置了属性或属性, 则忽略此属性。This property is ignored if either the property or the property is set. 与属性标识的图像相比, 属性所标识的映像的加载速度要快得多, 因为 Office 应用程序只会在首次显示功能区时从你的解决方案中检索该图像。Images identified by the property can be loaded slightly faster than images identified by the property, because the Office application retrieves the image from your solution only the first time the Ribbon is displayed. 属性`true`必须为, 控件才能显示图像。The property must be `true` for the control to display the image. 在设计时设置属性时, Visual Studio 会将属性自动设置为`true`。When you set the property at design time, Visual Studio automatically sets the property to `true`. 如果在运行时设置属性, 必须在代码中将属性设置为`true` 。If you set the property at run time, you must set the property to `true` in your code.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个 ，用于提供此 中的项所显示的图像的尺寸。

span.span: Gets or sets a that gives the dimensions of the images that are displayed by the items in this .

value.span: 一个 ，可提供此 中的项所显示的图像尺寸。

span.span: A that gives the dimensions of the images that are displayed by the items in this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口可以更好地控制图像大小, 而不是或。 The interface gives more control over the image size than either or . 这是三个接口中的唯一一个, 可用于指定图像宽度和高度 (以像素为单位)。It is the only one of the three interfaces that enables you to specify an image width and height in pixels. 此属性不会影响此中按钮上显示的图像的大小。This property does not affect the size of images displayed on buttons in this .

summary.span: 获取一个此 中 组件的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of the components in this .

value.span: 一个此 中的 组件集合。

span.span: A collection of the components in this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在设计时或运行时向添加对象。You can add objects to a at design time or at run time.

summary.span: 打开 时发生。

span.span: Occurs when this is opened.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件在每次打开时发生, 即使其中没有任何项或按钮也是如此。This event occurs every time the is opened, even when there are no items or buttons in it.

summary.span: 获取或设置此 的键盘快捷键。

span.span: Gets or sets the keyboard shortcut for this .

value.span: 此 的当前键盘快捷键。

span.span: The current keyboard shortcut for this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks KeyTip 必须包含1至3个大写字符, 不能包含空格、制表符或换行符。A KeyTip must have from 1 to 3 uppercase characters, and must not contain spaces, tabs, or newline characters. Keytip 有时称为 "访问键" 或 "加速器", 用作激活控件的快捷键组合。KeyTips are sometimes known as access keys or accelerators and are used as shortcut key combinations that activate controls. 按 ALT 键时, 功能区上将显示键提示。KeyTips appear on the Ribbon when you press the ALT key. 如果 KeyTip 与内置控件或其他外接程序的 keytip 发生冲突, Microsoft Office 可能会自动分配不冲突的 KeyTip 值。If your KeyTip conflicts with KeyTips for built-in controls or from other add-ins, Microsoft Office might assign non-conflicting KeyTip values automatically. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[使用键盘处理功能区程序](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=93523)。For more information, see [Use the keyboard to work with Ribbon programs](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=93523).

summary.span: 获取或设置此 上显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that appears on this .

value.span: 此 上显示的文本。

span.span: The text that appears on this .

summary.span: 如果要使用内置 Microsoft Office 图标，请获取或设置要在控件上显示的图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the image to display on the control, if you want to use a built-in Microsoft Office icon.

value.span: 作为此控件图标的内置 Microsoft Office 图标的 ID。

span.span: The ID of a built-in Microsoft Office icon that serves as the icon for this control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识控件显示的 Office 图标。The property identifies an Office icon that is displayed by the control. 属性值是标识`imageMso`所选图标的值的字符串。The property value is a string that identifies the `imageMso` value of the selected icon. 此属性可在设计时或运行时设置。This property can be set at design time or at run time. 如果在运行时更新此属性, 控件的外观将更新以反映更改。If you update this property at run time, the control's appearance is updated to reflect the change. 有关`imageMso`值的列表, 请参阅 Microsoft 下载中心页面[Office 2010 外接程序:图标库](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=220760)。For a list of `imageMso` values, see the Microsoft Download Center page [Office 2010 Add-In: Icons Gallery](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=220760). 如果设置了属性, 则忽略此属性。This property is ignored if the property is set. 由于图像缓存在 Office 应用程序中, 因此可以比属性标识的图像稍快地加载属性标识的图像。Images identified by the property can be loaded slightly faster than images identified by the property, because the images are cached in the Office application. 属性`true`必须为, 控件才能显示图像。The property must be `true` for the control to display the image. 在设计时设置属性时, Visual Studio 会将属性自动设置为`true`。When you set the property at design time, Visual Studio automatically sets the property to `true`. 如果在运行时设置属性, 必须在代码中将属性设置为`true` 。If you set the property at run time, you must set the property to `true` in your code. ## Examples 下面的示例将 Microsoft Office 图标分配给库控件中的两个项。The following example assigns Microsoft Office icons to two items in a gallery control. 若要运行此代码示例, 必须首先执行以下步骤:To run this code example, you must first perform the following steps: 1. 向使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 项目模板创建的项目添加 "**功能区 (可视化设计器)** " 项。Add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to a project created by using Office project templates in Visual Studio. 2. 将组添加到自定义选项卡。Add a group to the custom tab. 3. 将库添加到组。Add a gallery to the group. [!code-csharp[Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties#6](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties/CS/Ribbon1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties#6](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties/VB/Ribbon1.vb#6)]

summary.span: 获取或设置库的位置（如果库在 Microsoft Office 菜单上）。

span.span: Gets or sets the position of the gallery, if the gallery is on the Microsoft Office Menu.

value.span: 一个 ，表示库的位置（如果库在 Microsoft Office 菜单上）。

span.span: A that represents the position of the gallery, if the gallery is on the Microsoft Office Menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅在某些情况下, 才能在运行时设置此属性。This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview). 当库位于功能区上的组中时, 属性不起作用。The property has no effect when the gallery is placed in a group on the Ribbon.

summary.span: 获取或设置此 显示的 组件的行数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of rows of components that this displays.

value.span: 此 显示的 组件的行数。

span.span: The number of rows of components that this displays.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这会滚动其组件是否比显示的组件多。This scrolls if it has more components than can be displayed. 仅在某些情况下, 才能在运行时设置此属性。This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview).

summary.span: 获取或设置用户将指针移到此 上方时显示的提示文本。

span.span: Gets or sets tip text that appears when the user moves the pointer over this .

value.span: 用户将指针移到控件上方时显示的文本。

span.span: The text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值的长度必须小于1024个字符。The value must be less than 1024 characters in length. 设置属性时 , 值显示为的标题。 When the property is set, the value appears as the title of the .

summary.span: 获取或设置当前所选的项目。

span.span: Gets or sets the currently selected item.

value.span: 当前选定的 。

span.span: The currently selected .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将属性设置为`true`, 则当前选定的项仅与项的其余部分具有相同的外观。The currently selected item is only visually distinguishable from the rest of the items if the property is set to `true`. 如果它在其 集合中至少有一个,则保证不是。`null` If this has at least one in its collection, then is guaranteed not to be `null`. 默认情况下, 集合中的第一个处于选中状态。By default, the first in the collection is selected. 此属性只能设置为此控件的集合中的组件。This property can only be set to components that are in this control's collection.

summary.span: 获取或设置当前选定的 的索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the index of the currently selected .

value.span: 当前选定的 的索引。

span.span: The index of the currently selected .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 更改属性将更改由属性返回的值。 Changing the property changes the value returned by the property. 实际上, 更改属性会更改所选内容。In effect, changing the property changes the selection. 分配给的值必须介于 0 (零) 到 (`Items.Count` -1) 之间。Values assigned to the must be from 0 (zero) through (`Items.Count` - 1). 如果集合为空, 则此属性返回-1。If the collection is empty, this property returns -1.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示与 关联的图像是否可见。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the image that is associated with the is visible.

value.span: 如果与控件关联的图像可见，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the image that is associated with the control is visible; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `true`如果在设计时设置、或属性, 则此属性将自动设置为。This property is automatically set to `true` if you set the , , or property at design time. 您可以将其设置`false`为, 以使与此控件关联的图像处于隐藏状态。You can set it to `false` to cause the image associated with this control to be hidden. 在运行 时设置、或属性不会更改属性的值。Setting the , , or property at run time does not change the value of the property. 此属性对快速访问工具栏上显示的此按钮的实例无效。This property has no effect for instances of this button that are displayed on the Quick Access Toolbar. 如果将此属性设置为`true`, 但没有与该控件关联的图像, 则会显示一个空白图像。If this property is set to `true`, but there is no image associated with the control, a blank image is displayed.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否为库中的项显示图像。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether images are displayed for the items in the gallery.

value.span: 如果显示图像，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the images are displayed; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅在某些情况下, 才能在运行时设置此属性。This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview).

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否为此 中的项显示标签。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether labels are shown for items on this .

value.span: 如果标签可见，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the labels are visible; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅在某些情况下, 才能在运行时设置此属性。This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview).

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当前所选的 在外观上是否与其余未选择的项有所区别。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the currently selected is visually differentiated from the rest of the unselected items.

value.span: 如果所选项突出显示，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if selected items are highlighted, otherwise .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将属性设置为`false`不会导致当前的选择消失。 Setting the property to `false` does not cause the current selection to go away. 当前所选内容只是在用户界面中未直观标识。The current selection is just not visually identified in the user interface. `null`如果此在其集合中至少有一个, 则保证不为。 The is guaranteed not to be `null` if this has at least one in its collection. 默认情况下, 集合中的第一个处于选中状态。By default, the first in the collection is selected. 如果将`true` 属性设置为, 则仅当用户单击当前未选择的项时, 才会引发的事件。 If the property is set to `true`, the event of the is raised only when a user clicks an item that is not currently selected. 仅在某些情况下, 才能在运行时设置此属性。This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview).

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示此 的标签是否可见。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the label for this is visible.

value.span: 如果标签可见，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the label is visible, otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

summary.span: 获取或设置用户将指针移到 上时显示的多行提示文本。

span.span: Gets or sets multiline tip text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the .

value.span: 包含多行提示文本的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains multiline tip text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字符串的长度必须小于1024个字符。The string must be less than 1024 characters in length. 显示在 " 文本" 下。The appears under text. 与不同的是 , 会在字符串中启用分行符。Unlike the , the enables line breaks in the string.
